item.title: Kids Regular Fit Tee (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: This youth pro weight tee is perfect for every kid who wants a comfortable shirt to play, relax, or romp around in. Durable, high quality print will survive many adventures. Regular fit 100% Soft cotton (Safety green and Safety orange contain 50% Polyester) Light fabric (5.2 oz /yd² (176 g/m²)) Tear away label Runs smaller […]
item.content:encoded:
This youth pro weight tee is perfect for every kid who wants a comfortable shirt to play, relax, or romp around in. Durable, high quality print will survive many adventures.

  • Regular fit
  • 100% Soft cotton (Safety green and Safety orange contain 50% Polyester)
  • Light fabric (5.2 oz /yd² (176 g/m²))
  • Tear away label
  • Runs smaller than usual

item.title: Infant Rip Snap Tee (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: This rib snap tee allows the smallest ones to look cool. Excellent quality print will survive their very first ventures. True fit 100% Soft cotton Light (5.8 oz/yd² (197 g/m²)) Tear away label Runs true to size
item.content:encoded:
This rib snap tee allows the smallest ones to look cool. Excellent quality print will survive their very first ventures.

  • True fit
  • 100% Soft cotton
  • Light (5.8 oz/yd² (197 g/m²))
  • Tear away label
  • Runs true to size

item.title: Women’s Racerback Tank (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: High quality print of this regular fit tank-top will turn heads. And it’s worth to have a second look – the racerback cut makes every woman look good. Regular fit 97% Cotton 3% Spandex Light fabric (4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²)) Tear away label Runs smaller than usual
item.content:encoded:
High quality print of this regular fit tank-top will turn heads. And it’s worth to have a second look – the racerback cut makes every woman look good.

  • Regular fit
  • 97% Cotton 3% Spandex
  • Light fabric (4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²))
  • Tear away label
  • Runs smaller than usual

item.title: Women’s Tri-Blend Dolman (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: This loose fit tee has a distinctly fashionable look. Additionally, unbelievably soft tri-blend fabric makes it extremely comfortable – a must have in every woman’s wardrobe. Loose fit 50% Polyester; 25% Soft cotton; 25% Rayon Light fabric (4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²)) Sewn in label Runs bigger than usual
item.content:encoded:
This loose fit tee has a distinctly fashionable look. Additionally, unbelievably soft tri-blend fabric makes it extremely comfortable – a must have in every woman’s wardrobe.

  • Loose fit
  • 50% Polyester; 25% Soft cotton; 25% Rayon
  • Light fabric (4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²))
  • Sewn in label
  • Runs bigger than usual

item.title: Unisex Jersey Tank (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: XS S M L XL 2XL Width, in 17 19 21 23 25 27 Length, in 26 27 28 29 30 31 This must-have unisex tank fits like a well-loved favorite. High quality print makes it an ultimate statement shirt for years to come. .: Retail fit .: 100% Soft cotton .: Extra Light fabric […]
item.content:encoded:
XS S M L XL 2XL
Width, in 17 19 21 23 25 27
Length, in 26 27 28 29 30 31

This must-have unisex tank fits like a well-loved favorite. High quality print makes it an ultimate statement shirt for years to come.

.: Retail fit
.: 100% Soft cotton
.: Extra Light fabric (3.8 oz/yd² (110 g/m²))
.: Sewn in label
.: Runs true to size

item.title: Men’s Tee-Shirt (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL Width, in 16 18 20 22 24 26 28 Length, in 27 28 29 30 31 32 33 Sleeve length, in 9 9 10 10 10 11 12 The name does not lie – this VIT is designed to make one look like a VIP for any occasion. […]
item.content:encoded:
XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL
Width, in 16 18 20 22 24 26 28
Length, in 27 28 29 30 31 32 33
Sleeve length, in 9 9 10 10 10 11 12

The name does not lie – this VIT is designed to make one look like a VIP for any occasion. High quality print makes it a must-have item in every wardrobe.

.: Semi-slim fit
.: 100% Soft cotton
.: Light fabric (4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²))
.: Tear away label
.: Runs true to size
